message: Hi Bob, I propose we split $100 evenly at this first round. Given the inflation hit on my side with each round that passes, itâ€™s in both our best interests to settle quickly on a fair, 50/50 division. What do you think?

Hi Alice, since you mentioned inflation affects your side, I understand you want to settle quickly. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is still a fair offer considering the circumstances, and we can avoid further rounds of negotiation.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. Given that every extra round further depreciates my share by 20%, I appreciate settling early. I accept the 60/40 split in your favor.
